portfolio.title: Temple Inn & Suites
portfolio.techStack: HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript (APIs, JSON, DOM - Event listeners), Responsive Web Design, HTML Form Validation

portfolio.title: Random Harry Potter Character Generator
portfolio.techStack: HTML5, CSS3, CSS Transitions, JavaScript (External API, Event listeners, Arrays, Objects, Loops, JS Classes, Modular JS), Responsive Web Design
portfolio.summary: One-page App using External Public Harry Potter Characters API filtered to display only items with images and corresponding character information
portfolio.imgAlt: Screenshot of the Random Harry Potter Character Generator App homepage

portfolio.title: Cambs Chamber of Commerce
